clip.quote: You're not going to get replaced by AI, but you're going to get replaced by somebody who uses AI very soon.
clip.why_clipworthy: Challenges the listener to rethink the impact of AI on their career.
clip.suggested_hook: Is AI coming for your real estate job? Here's the truth.

clip.quote: It is no longer accessible to say I am John Q REALTOR expert in real estate. We're all experts in real estate.
clip.why_clipworthy: Emphasizes the need for specialization in the real estate industry.
clip.suggested_hook: Why being a generalist in real estate is no longer enough.
